group_1.textRight: What?!
Then, then, they aren't gonna to do anything?!

group_1.textLeft: That seems to be the Neo-Magius' plan.
They won't take any real action until the@festival here is over.

group_1.textRight: But, but, we want the [textYellow:Kimochi] stones too,@don't we?
Other groups are collecting them, so why@aren't we doing anything?

group_1.textLeft: If Her Highness and her boyfriend have some@kind of strategy in mind, isn't that fine?
More importantly, now that we've been given time,@we must ensure the festival is held without incident.
This year in particular, we'll have to manage it@on our own.

group_1.textRight: Oh... I'm sorry...

group_1.textLeft: No, I apologize as well. I don't mean to@blame you.

group_1.textRight: But, if my dad's company hadn't withdrawn@their sponsorship...
We probably would have been able to@continue it next year too...

group_1.textLeft: There's nothing you could do about it...

group_1.textRight: But I'm still frustrated...
You stop me from going out of control...
And you helped me in the Wings of Magius...
But I can't even protect what's important to you...

group_1.textLeft: That sentiment alone is enough.
Being a Magical Girl doesn't mean we have a say@among the dealings between adults...
After we use our wish to create a miracle,@we still have to ride the waves of the world.
So for now, let's just strive for success@until the end.

group_1.textRight: If the supremacy of Magical Girl spreads...
Will the Hikarizuka Fire Festival return someday,@like you say...?

group_1.textLeft: That's natural, isn't it?
In the eyes of the people, Magical Girls will be@superior beings that stand above them.
It will become a festival to honor such@godlike figures.

group_1.textRight: That's a relief...
I was afraid this would be the last time I see@your legs during the dance performance.

group_1.textLeft: Miyu...

group_1.textRight: I'm sowwy...

group_1.textLeft: Hm, a message from the Youth Association...?

group_1.textRight: Are they asking you to come back?

group_1.textLeft: No, they're asking if I know where the chairman is.

group_1.textRight: He's not at the community center?

group_1.textLeft: It's unusual for him to be absent when@the festival is so close...
Ah, he must be on his way to the@community center now.
[chara:103101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: Lady San, Lady San...! The chairman...!

group_1.textLeft: Yes...

group_1.textRight: Lady San, the source is close!!

group_1.textLeft: He may have been targeted because he was@so anxious...
If anything happens, the festival will be@canceled...
We must put a stop to this...!
